messages.title: My pledges. Since 2005:
messages.content: A strong economy, quicker and better NHS treatment, investing in schools and children's futures, tackling crime and anti-social behaviour, more help for pensioners.

messages.title: Supporting constituents
messages.content: "Hugh Bayley got the law changed to provide justice to people like my son, Liam, who was nearly killed by a dangerous driver." - Dawn Stagnell, Tang Hall, York

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Has 5,800 more jobs, will keep working to get more jobs for York.
Waiting times at York Hospital have been halved, thanks to the NHS staff and our NHS targets.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investing in schools and children's futures
keyPolicies.policyDescription: £91 million invested in school buildings in York and a new £60 million science park.
Crime down in York - from 22,779 to 17,781 crimes this year. More police stations and more policemen on the beat than before.
Full fee pay pensions start this year, and free swimming and GP health checks.

issues.education: £91 million invested in school buildings in York and a new £60 million science park.
issues.health: Waiting times at York Hospital have been halved, thanks to the NHS staff and our NHS targets.
issues.socialWelfare: Full fee pay pensions start this year, and free swimming and GP health checks.

housing.content: Strong families are the building blocks for strong communities. Labour supports families - with jobs, better schools, childcare and cash. In York 15,900 families receive child and working tax credits worth around £3,000 a year.

leaflet.personalStatement: Strong families are the building blocks for strong communities.

politicalExperience.achievements: Hugh secured a recession-busting loan guarantee to build a confectionery packing plant in York, and has brought hundreds of government jobs to our city. Cancer deaths in York down by 16% and heart disease deaths by 60%. NHS waiting times halved. Women in York now live 2 years and men 3 years longer.

endorsements.endorsement: Hugh Bayley got the law changed to provide justice to my son.

images.caption: Hugh Bayley listens to his constituents
Hugh Bayley makes a difference in York
